document.full_text: charles schwab corp , the largest u.s. discount brokerage, posted higher-than-forecast earnings as rising stock markets fueled increased trading and fees from clients, sending the stock up more than 2 percent.
document.title: schwab's profit up on higher fees; shares rise
lines_and_colors: charles schwab corp , the largest u.s. discount brokerage, posted higher-than-forecast earnings as rising stock markets fueled increased trading and fees from clients, sending the stock up more than 2 percent.
